title: Snofari
creator_credit: New Zealand National Film Unit, Geoffrey Scott, Ronald Bowie and Grant Foster
brief_description: A visitor to New Zealand and a friend spend a week in Queenstown in winter. They enjoy the winter sports of skiing and skating. They also hike over the surrounding countryside, visit the lakes and take a trip on the steamer, “Earnslaw”.
creator_credit_for_label: New Zealand National Film Unit, Geoffrey Scott, Ronald Bowie and Grant Foster
